attributes.action: Back a 10% off fuel nationwide car share scheme. Less congestion & pollution!
attributes.additional_details:
The 10% off fuel is the suggested incentive for a massive increase in car sharing and in doing so, surprisingly the government can save money year on year not by building more or bigger roads [1]. Car share apps provide high levels of safety for driver and passenger and an alternate lift home if the driver or passenger has to leave work early or later at short notice [2].
 [1] A study from INRIX   https://tinyurl.com/hbhed4b
 [2] Detailed article on smart mobility  https://tinyurl.com/kb54z8d
attributes.background: Congestion, pollution and associated health problems are at an all-time high.  This petition is to ask the government to take a fresh look at solutions that are available today that can dramatically reduce congestion such as high tech car sharing. Using roads sensibly will save everyone money.

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.
